title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-8.1 - Compensation for authority members
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-8.1 - Compensation for authority members

State Regulations
(a) Housing authorities with State-aided
programs may compensate each of their members at an aggregate rate not to
exceed $2,000 per annum, and their chairman at a rate not to exceed $2,500 per
annum, payable on a per diem basis. (b) A resolution by the authority authorizing
such compensation is to be submitted to the division upon adoption. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-8.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
